CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image 2001.35.43627 published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 5, 1955, page 21 reads: "Farrell Stalwarts - Two of the key figures in Farrell High School's drive for its second state high school cage championship are pictured above with their coach, Eddie McCluskey. On the left is Charley Kemp, and on the right is Jim McCoy. Both were regulars last season. McCoy was an all-state selection. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Jim McCoy, wearing light colored basketball uniform with "14" on shorts, tying right shoe on bench, in locker room with chalkboard, and poster that reads "Ked's Bulletin The Shoe of Champions"
